page.title: 14Farms to private houses
page.content: {STUD FARM}The farmer retired in 1985 and the land,owned by Lord Scarbrough, was added to Bagley Farm.The farmer now lives at Stud Farm as a private tenant. {FOLDS FARM}In 1965 the farmer retired. His son continued farming there until the death of his father,when he had to vacate the farm.The land,owned by Lord Scarbrough,was put to Sandbeck Farm and the house is let to a private tenant. {CARR HOUSE FARM}The farmer died in 1970 and the landlord,Lord Scarbrough, agreed that the son could farm the land for two more years.In 1972 the land was put to Woolthwaite Farm.The farmhouse has since been demolished. {BLYTHGATE FARM}In 1980 the house and land were sold.The purchaser farms the land but he lets the house to a tenant.
